summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: MyGift Luxuriously Soft Padded Spa Bath Pillow / Cushion - Hinged Dual Sections, w/ Premium Suction Cups Review Date: 2014/09/28 Store: YRMJK Product Description: ['MyGift Luxuriously Soft Padded Spa Bath Pillow / Cushion - Hinged Dual Sections, w/ Premium Suction Cups'] Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14.5 x 2 x 13 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.57 Pounds', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '14.5 x 2 x 13 inches; 9.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '887702050430', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthMarket'} Review Text: This bath pillow has made soaking much more pleasant. The suction cups really hold in place and the pillow cradles my head very comfortably. It is easy to keep clean and a perfect addition to my bathing. It was also a very good value price-wise. I am most pleased with this purchase. Review Title: Excellent bath pillow with perfect suction Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nice 'n Easy Permanent Color 9G Light Golden Blonde 1 ea (Pack of 3) Review Date: 2015/05/03 Store: Clairol Product Description: ['Product Description', "The secret to our natural looking color is Clairol's exclusive ColorBlend Technology, which expertly blends 3 complementary tones into every shade. The result? Natural looking color that's perfectly true to you!", 'From the Manufacturer', 'Get a shade that’s your most true, most you. Thanks to Color Blend Technology,', 'Nice ’n Easy', 'gives you expert highlights and lowlights without the salon. Nice ‘n Easy layers tones and highlights to make over your color. Every shade has our exclusive Color Blend Technology, combining rich tones with contouring highlights in just one step. Expert improvements in all golden shades give you color with high-def dimension and less brassiness. You’ll get dimensional, true-to-you hair color and 100% gray coverage no matter which shade you choose. It’s color that simply comes to life.', 'Expert Highlights & Lowlights in One Simple Step', 'Get color so true, all they see is you. Nice ‘n Easy gives you expert highlights and lowlights without the salon, bringing your look to life. Our expert Color Blend Technology enhances the natural variations in your hair, for a shade that’s true to you.', 'Key Features', 'Permanent liquid hair color with Precision Applicator', 'Permanent liquid hair color with Precision Applicator', 'Lasts up to 8 weeks', 'Lasts up to 8 weeks', '100% gray coverage', '100% gray coverage', 'Includes ColorSeal Conditioning Gloss to help seal in beautiful color and add intense shine', 'Includes ColorSeal Conditioning Gloss to help seal in beautiful color and add intense shine', 'Types of Hair Color', 'Compare Types of Clairol hair color.', 'Brand # of Shades Gray Coverage Color Type Color Lasts Works In Formula', "Nice 'n Easy Perfect 10", '24 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 Weeks 10 minutes Micropearls forhigh-gloss color', "Nice 'n Easy", '42 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 Weeks 25 minutes Color Blend Technologyfor highlights & lowlights', 'Color Blend Foam', '23 100% Permanent Foam Color Up to 8 Weeks 25 minutes Color Blend Technologyin a drip-free foam', "Nice 'n Easy Root Touch-Up", '18', 'formulated to matchany shade', '100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 3 weeks 10 minutes More shade choices,to match any shade,even salon color', '*', 'Natural Instincts', '23 Up to 50% Demi-PermanentCrème Color Up to 28 shampoos 10 minutes Clinically provenhealthier', '**', 'color withno ammonia', 'Natural Instincts Vibrant', '13 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 weeks 10 minutes Anitoxidants helpfight damage', '* Among leading retail permanent shade and pre-formulated salon color** Natural Instincts non-permanent Level 2 vs. leading Triple protection permanent Level 3 color crème: based on amount of surface damage', 'Meet Your Perfect Match', 'Take the guesswork out of gorgeous. Try our quick tool and we’ll give you personalized, expert shade recommendations. Visit Clairol.com/MyShade.', 'Vibrant, Healthy-Looking Color', 'Enjoy stunning, healthy-looking color for up to 8 weeks.', 'view larger'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Color': 'light golden blonde', 'Brand': 'Clairol', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 6.5 x 3.7 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'HFC Prestige International U.S. LLC'} Review Text: I was looking forward to trying this new Clairol "Sun Kissed" Natural Light Golden Blond haircolor and was hoping for great results. It begain with a very roomy pair of applicator gloves (man-sized) and an easy to pour solution into the applicator bottle containing the developer. I have been coloring my hair for most of my life and I applied the product and left to sit at my computer while the color did its thing. I was pleased that it didn't have a terrible odor and that it didn't drip. Those were two great positives. I did not look in the mirror until I renetered the bathroom and was shocked to see that the stuff on my head had turned a dark reddish shade. I was hopeful that it would wash off in the shower and that my hair would appear a light golden blond as advertised and it did. While the change from my former product results gave me a surprise, it actually flatters my skin tone and I am glad I gave it a try. Will continue using it because I love the new shade on me. I added it to my Subscribe and Save products.

My hair is mow varigated strawberry blond, but my hair was always varigated because some parts are white, some parts are grey, some parts I really can't see (the back of my head); it is more strawberry blond than golden blond.

I suspect that one's results will depend upon your own hair. I actually find the change refreshing. Review Title: Natural Light Golden Blond Results on My Hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LOT OF 4 AVON GLIMMERSTICKS WATERPROOF EYELINER SMOKEY GREY Review Date: 2017/12/08 Store: AVON Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AVON', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.3 x 2.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '888761116754', 'Manufacturer': 'Avon'} Review Text: Really like these eyeliner sticks in hard to find gray color. Easy to apply and long lasting Review Title: Great value in hard to find gray eyeliner pencils Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Yes To Face Wipes for Women and Men, Sensitive Facial Cleansing Wipes for use as a Make Up Remover, Cleaning, Soothing, Cucumbers Aloe Vera (Pack of 2) Review Date: 2018/03/03 Store: Yes To Product Description: ["Yes To Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes gently remove dirt, sweat and makeup (eye makeup too!) without the need to rinse. Whether you're out and about, going for a run, or having a late night, these wipes make it a snap to refresh on-the-go. Packed with green superfoods these all-natural, biodegradable wipes naturally refresh and rejuvenate all-in-one. Stay gorgeous, and go from zero to clean in seconds! Snap up the lid and snatch out a towelette! Gently glide across your face and neck. Feel refreshed? You should- your skin is clean, revitalized and nourished- in just a snap! These 95% natural, oil-free, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic wipes are made with compostable, FSC certified fabric. They are petroleum free, SLS free, paraben free, and cruelty-free. Say Yes to Cucumbers Hypoallergenic Facial Wipes! These 2 pack wipes are specifically sold by the manfucaturer. We can&rsquo. INGREDIENTS Water, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativas (Cucumber) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract, Sodium Chloride (Sea Salt), Carpylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance."] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yes To', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Compostable Warning', 'Unit Count': '60 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '4.6 x 3.75 x 5.5 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1024734', 'UPC': '815921024734', 'Manufacturer': 'Yes To Inc.', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More'} Review Text: Great makeup remover cloths for use at home or on the go. Soothing and hypoallergenic. Removes eye makeup easily and leaves skin feeling fresh and clean. Great for travel. Review Title: Great for removing makeup and for travel or on the go use Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LaClaire Foaming Botanical Facial Cleanser with Enriched Antioxidant Botanicals - Nourishing pH Balanced Face Wash (50 ml/1.65 oz), Made in the USA Review Date: 2018/08/25 Store: LaClaire Product Description: ['A gentle foaming cleanser utilizing natural beneficial antioxidant botanicals to draw out impurities, excess oil and pollutants. Our foaming cleanser removes debris without disrupting skin’s delicate PH balance. Use our cleanser to detoxify, purify and condition the skin’s natural barrier.'] Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 5.5 x 1.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '891040000682', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'} Review Text: This is a lovely gentle foam that removed my makeup and prepared my skin for a good night's sleep. It comes in a very small container, but a little bit goes a long way. It feels rich and very soothing and is made of many botanical ingedients. WHile the directions suggest that one avoid eyes, I didn't and kept them tightly shut while washing my face and then rinsing it thoroughly. Review Title: Gentle Foam Removes Makeup Including Eueliner and Mascara Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible With Oral B Braun Electric Toothbrush, 4 Count Review Date: 2019/06/21 Store: HDY Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HDY', 'Size': '4 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '632088377561', 'Manufacturer': 'HDY'} Review Text: I like to change my brush head frequently. This replacement brush is excellent and cleaned my teeth perfectly. My grandfather was a dentist and instilled in me the desire to keep my teeth and gums in good health. These replacement brushes are every bit as effective as the name brand ones. Review Title: Equal to name brand replacement brushes Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day Review Date: 2020/07/22 Store: SIKEMAY Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676838', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'} Review Text: This mascara came beautifully packaged and in an aquamarine tube. However, there is no list of ingredients and it comes from China. I would like to now it is cruelty-free and what is in its ingredients. While it did a good job of being mascara and has a nice applicator brush, not knowing what is in it makes me skeptical. Review Title: Works well but.... Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MainBasics Headband with Buttons for Face Masks (Gray) Review Date: 2020/07/22 Store: MainBasics Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'MainBasics', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.5 x 3.5 x 0.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '790887351233'} Review Text: I wear hearing aids and the over the ear masks get tangled up with my very expensive aids. If I added a pair of glasses, it is beyond uncomfortable. This band is the perfect solution I can protect my hearing aids, wear a mask, and my sunglasses. The ear loops on the mask attache to the buttons on either side of the headband. It also keeps the preparation on my forehead from rolling down my face. Thank you for this great design! Review Title: Great for hearing aid wearers Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rhinestone Crystal Padded Headband Bejewled Statement Wide Hairband Charm Bridal Wedding Party Headwear Hair Hoop Hair Accessorie (rainbow) Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: JERTOCLE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'Rainbow', 'Material': 'Vinyl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'JERTOCLE', 'Size': '5 5 Inch', 'Package Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 0.49 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LECE', 'UPC': '783911261387'} Review Text: Made for a very big head. It is pretty and heavy, but much to big for my head. It is it’s length that’s the problem. Review Title: Pretty but made for big headed women Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MOSTORY Glitter Crystal Liquid Eyeshadow Set - 4 Pack Pigmented Liquid Eye shadows Matte Shimmer Metallic Quick Dry Crease Resistant Long Lasting Flake-Proof Blendable Non-Greasy Eye Makeup (4 Pack) Review Date: 2020/11/09 Store: MOSTORY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Long last, Crease proof, Blendable', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 4.49 x 0.87 inches; 5.11 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a very funky fun collection of glitter eyeshadow. This is for those who want to add a lot of glamour to their makeup and are bold, young and fashion forward. In these days of mask wearing, why not make a statement with your eyes since your lips are hidden? Review Title: Bold glimmer eyeshadow Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pippa Of London Magic Star Eyeshadow Powder Pencil, Long Lasting, Blendable Eye Make Up Stick Review Date: 2020/12/21 Store: Pippa Of London Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Chalfont 303 – a shimmering shade of pearl', 'Brand': 'Pippa Of London', 'Item Form': 'Stick, Pencil, Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.25 x 0.83 x 0.75 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Pippa of London', 'Country of Origin': 'United Kingdom'} Review Text: This is a fabulous eyeshadow. The color, Chalfont 303, is very light and the sheen is so pretty and long lasting. It didn’t sink into crevices but stayed in place all day. Since it comes in a pencil form, it is super easy to apply in all the right places. It really accentuated the appearance of my eyes and is gentle to my delicate skin. The area around my eyes looked as good at night as it did when I applied the product in the morning. This eyeshadow is a winner! Review Title: Superb eyeshadow in pencil form, long lasting and easy to use Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: GLOW BOOSTER SERUM Review Date: 2021/02/16 Store: Catrice Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Glow', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Item Form': 'Serum'} Review Text: I use this serum on my face and neck every morning after my shower. I find it gives my skin a healthy look and minimizes wrinkles. I no longer bother with foundation but must use blush and eye makeup. The included eyedropper dispenser makes it very easy to dispense and use. I love the way my skin feels after using just a tiny bit of this serum. A little goes a long way. Review Title: Excellent Skin Serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Oval Large Makeup Brushes Fast Application Liquid Cream Powder Foundation (Rose Gold 1) Review Date: 2021/05/14 Store: LAMJAD Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LAMJAD', 'Material': 'synthetic', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 3.07 x 1.61 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'UPC': '714403137835'} Review Text: This is a very soft and fine makeup smoothing applicator to eliminate streaks. It leaves my skin liking natural and healthy. The brush can bewahren to keep it clean. Review Title: Soft and. Comfortable for smoothing makeup Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Vegan Glow Quinoa Protein Shampoo Bar | EWG Verified | Vegetable proteins from Quinoa & Soybeans Review Date: 2021/08/30 Store: The Vegan Glow Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '2.91 x 2.91 x 1.34 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review Text: Having good quality shampoo in bars is a wonderful innovation. This is a way to eliminate plastics from your bathroom. The shampoo foams well and leaves my hair shiny and nice. Do your little bit to help reduce plastic waste and try this bar shampoo. Also, it you happen to travel, it is perfect for your carryons. Review Title: Love Bar Shampoo Vegan Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bloomeffects - Natural Tulip Dew Face Cream | Cruelty-Free, Non-Toxic, Clean Beauty (1.7 oz | 50 ml) Review Date: 2021/11/04 Store: Bloomeffects Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bloomeffects', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 3.27 x 2.91 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850006566419'} Review Text: I look for cruelty-free make-up products and this sure fits the bill. It is a wonderful facial product that makes my skin look and feel both soft and supple. This is an excellent product and I highly recommend it for all skin types. Review Title: Wonderful and Soothing Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Moisturizing Shampoo Bar | For Curly Hair | Hair Care, Ideal Ph Balance |Natural, Vegan | Eco-friendly, Sustainable, Plastic Free | Waterless & Zero Waste Review Date: 2022/01/15 Store: B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Dry', 'Scent': 'Citric and Woody', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'B.O.B BARS OVER BOTTLES', 'Country of Origin': 'Brazil'} Review Text: I have curly and wavy hair and this bar shampoo a lids plastic bottles while providing an excellent shampoo experience. It lathers well and leaves my hair feeling soft and silky. My hair is silver and it doesn’t leave any unanticipated stain of color, but leave my hair bright and shiny. It is gentle on my scalp. Couldn’t ask for anything better. Review Title: Love this solid bar shampoo Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: MyGift Luxuriously Soft Padded Spa Bath Pillow / Cushion - Hinged Dual Sections, w/ Premium Suction Cups Review Date: 2014/09/28 Store: YRMJK Product Description: ['MyGift Luxuriously Soft Padded Spa Bath Pillow / Cushion - Hinged Dual Sections, w/ Premium Suction Cups'] Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14.5 x 2 x 13 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.57 Pounds', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '14.5 x 2 x 13 inches; 9.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '887702050430', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthMarket'} Review Text: This bath pillow has made soaking much more pleasant. The suction cups really hold in place and the pillow cradles my head very comfortably. It is easy to keep clean and a perfect addition to my bathing. It was also a very good value price-wise. I am most pleased with this purchase. Review Title: Excellent bath pillow with perfect suction Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Nice 'n Easy Permanent Color 9G Light Golden Blonde 1 ea (Pack of 3) Review Date: 2015/05/03 Store: Clairol Product Description: ['Product Description', "The secret to our natural looking color is Clairol's exclusive ColorBlend Technology, which expertly blends 3 complementary tones into every shade. The result? Natural looking color that's perfectly true to you!", 'From the Manufacturer', 'Get a shade that’s your most true, most you. Thanks to Color Blend Technology,', 'Nice ’n Easy', 'gives you expert highlights and lowlights without the salon. Nice ‘n Easy layers tones and highlights to make over your color. Every shade has our exclusive Color Blend Technology, combining rich tones with contouring highlights in just one step. Expert improvements in all golden shades give you color with high-def dimension and less brassiness. You’ll get dimensional, true-to-you hair color and 100% gray coverage no matter which shade you choose. It’s color that simply comes to life.', 'Expert Highlights & Lowlights in One Simple Step', 'Get color so true, all they see is you. Nice ‘n Easy gives you expert highlights and lowlights without the salon, bringing your look to life. Our expert Color Blend Technology enhances the natural variations in your hair, for a shade that’s true to you.', 'Key Features', 'Permanent liquid hair color with Precision Applicator', 'Permanent liquid hair color with Precision Applicator', 'Lasts up to 8 weeks', 'Lasts up to 8 weeks', '100% gray coverage', '100% gray coverage', 'Includes ColorSeal Conditioning Gloss to help seal in beautiful color and add intense shine', 'Includes ColorSeal Conditioning Gloss to help seal in beautiful color and add intense shine', 'Types of Hair Color', 'Compare Types of Clairol hair color.', 'Brand # of Shades Gray Coverage Color Type Color Lasts Works In Formula', "Nice 'n Easy Perfect 10", '24 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 Weeks 10 minutes Micropearls forhigh-gloss color', "Nice 'n Easy", '42 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 Weeks 25 minutes Color Blend Technologyfor highlights & lowlights', 'Color Blend Foam', '23 100% Permanent Foam Color Up to 8 Weeks 25 minutes Color Blend Technologyin a drip-free foam', "Nice 'n Easy Root Touch-Up", '18', 'formulated to matchany shade', '100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 3 weeks 10 minutes More shade choices,to match any shade,even salon color', '*', 'Natural Instincts', '23 Up to 50% Demi-PermanentCrème Color Up to 28 shampoos 10 minutes Clinically provenhealthier', '**', 'color withno ammonia', 'Natural Instincts Vibrant', '13 100% Permanent Crème Color Up to 8 weeks 10 minutes Anitoxidants helpfight damage', '* Among leading retail permanent shade and pre-formulated salon color** Natural Instincts non-permanent Level 2 vs. leading Triple protection permanent Level 3 color crème: based on amount of surface damage', 'Meet Your Perfect Match', 'Take the guesswork out of gorgeous. Try our quick tool and we’ll give you personalized, expert shade recommendations. Visit Clairol.com/MyShade.', 'Vibrant, Healthy-Looking Color', 'Enjoy stunning, healthy-looking color for up to 8 weeks.', 'view larger'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Color': 'light golden blonde', 'Brand': 'Clairol', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 6.5 x 3.7 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'HFC Prestige International U.S. LLC'} Review Text: I was looking forward to trying this new Clairol "Sun Kissed" Natural Light Golden Blond haircolor and was hoping for great results. It begain with a very roomy pair of applicator gloves (man-sized) and an easy to pour solution into the applicator bottle containing the developer. I have been coloring my hair for most of my life and I applied the product and left to sit at my computer while the color did its thing. I was pleased that it didn't have a terrible odor and that it didn't drip. Those were two great positives. I did not look in the mirror until I renetered the bathroom and was shocked to see that the stuff on my head had turned a dark reddish shade. I was hopeful that it would wash off in the shower and that my hair would appear a light golden blond as advertised and it did. While the change from my former product results gave me a surprise, it actually flatters my skin tone and I am glad I gave it a try. Will continue using it because I love the new shade on me. I added it to my Subscribe and Save products.

My hair is mow varigated strawberry blond, but my hair was always varigated because some parts are white, some parts are grey, some parts I really can't see (the back of my head); it is more strawberry blond than golden blond.

I suspect that one's results will depend upon your own hair. I actually find the change refreshing. Review Title: Natural Light Golden Blond Results on My Hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LOT OF 4 AVON GLIMMERSTICKS WATERPROOF EYELINER SMOKEY GREY Review Date: 2017/12/08 Store: AVON Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AVON', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.3 x 2.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '888761116754', 'Manufacturer': 'Avon'} Review Text: Really like these eyeliner sticks in hard to find gray color. raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a consistent preference for high-quality personal care and beauty products with a focus on comfort and functionality. Their ratings reveal a generally positive sentiment, particularly for items that effectively meet their needs, highlighting comfort (e.g., bath pillows, makeup removers) and efficacy (e.g., hair color, cleansing products).

Common themes include a strong inclination towards products that enhance daily hygiene and beauty routines, with a noticeable emphasis on skincare and makeup items. They also prioritize products that are gentle and suitable for sensitive skin, as evidenced by their frequent choices of hypoallergenic and cruelty-free brands.

Quality preferences lean towards well-reviewed products that provide good value for money, indicating moderate price sensitivity—happy to invest in products that assure reasonable performance and quality. Notably, they appreciate natural ingredients and eco-friendly options, as seen with their interest in zero-waste shampoo bars and serums.

Lastly, the individual values practicality in their choices, such as travel-friendly formats and multi-functional products. Overall, their core preferences reflect a balance of quality, comfort, efficacy, and sustainability in personal care.

target_interaction.title: Use Insted of Foundation
target_interaction.text: I am an Octogenarian and makeup in the form of foundation looks silly on me and only serves to make me look older. This sheer balm in a compact balm gives my face a soft natural glow instead of a caked surface. I then apply blush and eyeliner, eyeshadow, eyebrows and a very sheer lipstick. I love the balm and the presentation of the product.
target_interaction.title_meta: JUNG SAEM MOOL OFFICIAL] JUNGSAEMMOOL Minifying Cica Mist Balm
